pages.text: The $(thing)paddles$() do not burn items, but require a player to move the boat. The engine will move the boat at $(6)0.04 * $(italics)Imposed Speed$() blocks / tick$(), where $(italics)Imposed Speed$() is the speed set inside the menu.$(br2)$(bold)$(underline)Note$()$(): You need to use a $(l:modules/storage/seat)Seat$() for a player to ride the boat.
